= Xencon x|pro 512 VPS =

  * Xencon x|pro 512 VPS
  * Dual CPU
  * 0.5 GB RAM
  * 40 GB HD (RAID 1/RAID 10)
  * with automated backups
  * 0.5 TB traffic/mo
  * http://www.xencon.net/
  * Debian 6.0 64 bit
  * Tests run 2011-07-26
